title: 1932 Colorado Agricultural Aggies football team
text: The 1932 Colorado Agricultural Aggies football team represented <a href="Colorado%20State%20University">Colorado Agricultural College</a> (now known as Colorado State University) in the <a href="Rocky%20Mountain%20Conference">Rocky Mountain Conference</a> (RMC) during the <a href="1932%20college%20football%20season">1932 college football season</a>. In their 23rd season under head coach <a href="Harry%20W.%20Hughes">Harry W. Hughes</a>, the Aggies compiled a 4–3–1 record, finished sixth in the RMC, and outscored opponents by a total of 100 to 45.
